channel.title: CVE Feed for Grundfos -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Grundfos -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-10609|2024-08-04T11:06:10.101Z -- grundfos -- cim%20500
item.description: Grundfos CIM 500 v06.16.00 stores plaintext credentials, which may allow sensitive information to be read or allow modification to system settings by someone with access to the device.

item.title: CVE-2020-10605|2024-08-04T11:06:09.938Z -- grundfos -- cim%20500
item.description: Grundfos CIM 500 before v06.16.00 responds to unauthenticated requests for password storage files.
